body: Do not read the next chapters, they're rushed and pointless cashgrab. This Is where the story should have ended IMO

Good for those who are desperate to know if they've already thrown out the husband. On page seven in the mail you are reading (I don't know Japanese, but I can use apps to try to understand more or less the idea of what they say) in the first part there is a rumor that your wife intends to leave you the second part says this

"次の金曜日私が行くまでに 奥さんのお尻の穴を君の手で 綺麓(こ洗つておいてくれ"
 In case anyone wants to translate it.

On the last page as far as I could understand, in the text that is not inside the conversation balloon the husband already panicked to see that face of satisfaction to his boss here the Japanese text in case anyone wants to check it. 
何だよ… その顔…
どうした んだよ… 奈璃…
どうして
ソイツの前で...
そんな顔...
私からは...
...な...

What's inside the conversation balloons I didn't understand if he's boss finished the initial agreement they had of chapter one or if there is still more time left of they initial agreement or if he's boss extended it. Once again left the text.

あ…
港一君…
おはよラ…
楽しい時は あゥといぅ聞だ...
南戸君…
契約も残り
@Didac Wait for the english version then we talk again
I have the part 4 in japanese language, but i don't know how to upload the album in the site, anyone an idea?
You realize how great of an author Etuzan is when you don't see people complaining it's NTR.

Wow...easily some of Etuzan's sexiest work yet. That being said, no matter how many times I see it, knowing Etu's a chick still makes me feel like Im an addict buyin' crack from my preacher >_>; Not complaining, (the work is DAMN beautiful) but...s..she knows too much >_>;;
Are we supposed to feel sorry for that cuck husband? lol Not happening. This cuck offered his wife to the boss.
Chapter 4 already published on other site
